name: Advertising and Promotions Managers_JAN.2023
description: The Advertising and Promotions Managers collection represents the skills necessary to plan, direct, or coordinate advertising policies and programs. Additionally, this collection includes the skills needed to produce collateral materials, such as posters, contests, coupons, or giveaways, to create interest in a product or service. These skills may be applicable to Account Executives, Advertising Managers, Communications Directors, and Promotion Directors. This collection of skills was developed in partnership with a panel of subject matter experts who have worked as advertising and promotions managers.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
